autonomy.question: Did you take for granted the blessings in your life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence, as if they were solely due to your own skills and determination?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted my accomplishments and success, forgetting to acknowledge God's providence in guiding me towards them?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I secretly wished that others would lose their blessings?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: of others ' successes , wealth , or happiness
envy.question: Have I ever felt envious of others' successes, wealth, or happiness, and secretly wished they wouldn't have them?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with vulgar or inappropriate language, using words that violated their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: with crude or off - color language
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control and speak to others with crude or off-color language?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in a way that showed disrespect for their dignity through my words
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others in a way that showed disrespect for their dignity through my words?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking, prioritizing pleasure over moderation?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: on entertainment , such as traveling with friends or attending concerts and music festivals , ahead of my financial obligations or family needs
such as traveling with friends or attending concerts and music festivals , ahead of my financial obligations or family needs
of my financial obligations or family needs
prodigality.question: Have I put excessive and wasteful spending on entertainment, such as traveling with friends or attending concerts and music festivals, ahead of my financial obligations or family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: over meeting my financial obligations or supporting those in need
prodigality.question: Have I been excessively wasteful in my spending habits, prioritizing entertainment over meeting my financial obligations or supporting those in need?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: for my own entertainment or enjoyment
gossip.question: Have I used my words to discuss others' personal matters, even if what I shared was true, for my own entertainment or enjoyment?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I entertained others by sharing their private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I enjoyed discussing my acquaintances' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impurity.question: Did I use certain practices, substances, or objects to prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.
